comments_since_last_sample.body:
I disagree that "it doesn't matter" that this process is happening without the influence of the USA - I think it's _essential._
The USA has been ever-more-firmly tied to the most aggressively reactionary forces in the region since the end of the Cold War - namely Saudi Arabia + the Gulf sheikhdoms, and Israel - in an axis _against_ Iran and the old Cold War foes.
I'll believe that the Biden Administration has abandoned this horrible strategy when they stop supporting the Saudi assault on Yemen.
